job.command:
starver dev
set RANDOM_SEED=`echo "(&RANDOM_SEED; + $JOBINDEX) * 1000" | bc` set JOB_INPUT_FILE=`echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk '{printf($1)}'` set RUN_ID=`echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk '{printf($2)}'` set JOB_NEVENTS=`echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk '{printf($3)}'` set JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME=`basename $JOB_INPUT_FILE | sed 's/\.[^.]*$//'`
setenv BFC_OPTIONS_1 `echo &JOB_BFC_OPTIONS_1; | sed 's/\./,/g'` setenv BFC_OPTIONS_2 `echo &JOB_BFC_OPTIONS_2; | sed 's/\./,/g'` setenv BFC_OPTIONS_3 `echo &JOB_BFC_OPTIONS_3; | sed 's/\./,/g'`
echo echo "RANDOM_SEED: " $RANDOM_SEED echo "JOB_INPUT_FILE: " $JOB_INPUT_FILE echo "RUN_ID: " $RUN_ID echo "JOB_NEVENTS: " $JOB_NEVENTS echo "JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME: " $JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME echo
pwd ls -al
ln -s ./GenerateVertex.C ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C set COMMAND='root4star -q -b ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C(0,'$JOB_NEVENTS','$RANDOM_SEED',"'$JOB_INPUT_FILE'","vertex.txt")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $COMMAND eval '$COMMAND' >&! &OUT_DIR;/log/${JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME}_vertex.log
mv .$STAR_HOST_SYS $STAR_HOST_SYS set COMMAND="starsim -w 0 -b ./simWRequest.kumac nevents=${JOB_NEVENTS} config=&STARSIM_MODE; run=$RUN_ID seed=$RANDOM_SEED file=$JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME.fzd vertexfile=vertex.txt" echo echo "Executing..." echo $COMMAND eval '$COMMAND' >&! &OUT_DIR;/log/${JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME}_starsim.log mv $STAR_HOST_SYS .$STAR_HOST_SYS
ln -s ./bfcMixer_pythia.C ./EmbeddingReco.C set COMMAND='root4star -q -b ./EmbeddingReco.C('$JOB_NEVENTS',"'$JOB_INPUT_FILE'","'$JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME'.fzd","'$BFC_OPTIONS_1'","'$BFC_OPTIONS_2'","'$BFC_OPTIONS_3'","W")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $COMMAND eval '$COMMAND' >&! &OUT_DIR;/log/${JOB_INPUT_FILEBASENAME}_bfcMixer.log
ls -al
echo "End of job: tralala"
